sentences: During sleep, most systems in an animal are in an <<||>> state, building up the immune, nervous, skeletal, and muscular systems. Sleep in <<||>> animals is observed in mammals, birds, reptiles, amphibians, and some fish, and, in some form, in insects and even in simpler animals such as nematodes. The internal <<||>> promotes sleep daily at night in diurnal organisms and in the day in nocturnal organisms. However, sleep <<||>> vary among individual humans and even more widely among other species. In the last century, <<||>> light has in many areas of the world substantially altered sleep timing among both humans and many other species. The diverse <<||>> and mechanisms of sleep are the subject of substantial ongoing <<||>>. Sleep seems to <<||>> animals with improvements in the body and mind. A well-known feature of sleep in humans is the dream, an experience typically <<||>> in narrative form, which <<||>> waking life while in progress, but which usually can later be distinguished as fantasy. Sleep is sometimes confused with <<||>>, but is quite different in terms of thought process. Humans may suffer from a number of sleep disorders. These include <<||>> (such as insomnia, hypersomnia, and sleep apnea), parasomnias (such as sleepwalking and REM behavior disorder), bruxism, and the circadian rhythm <<||>> disorders.
